programme.title: Baseball Girl
programme.desc: A young girl is graduating from high school and determined to become the first female player to join a professional baseball in Korea.

programme.title: The Map Against The World
programme.desc: After his father dies due to an erroneous map, Kim Jeong-Ho sets out to make an accurate map of Joseon.

programme.title: Battle Of Jangsari
programme.desc: A task force commander leads 772 student soldiers to flank the North Korean army and eliminate their supply line at Jangsari beach, in order to turn the tide of war in favor of South Korea.

programme.title: Believer
programme.desc: A police detective determined to catch the unseen boss of Asia's biggest drug cartel joins hands with a revenge-thirsty member of the gang.

programme.title: The Hot-Blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: The Divine Move
programme.desc: Go player Tae Seok is framed and imprisoned for his brother's death after losing a high-stakes game. After his sentence, he sets out for revenge against the underground gambler who destroyed his life.

programme.title: Athena: Goddess Of War
programme.desc: Set in the same murky world as IRIS, a new group of agents must face off against terrorists and untangle a dangerous conspiracy threatening national security.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: A voice from the future echoes through an antique radio connects the two living 20 years apart and changed Yong's life forever.

programme.title: Salut D'Amour
programme.desc: Follow the heart-warming tale about a pair of elderly people who, with the support of family and friends, find love despite their failing minds and weakening bodies.

programme.title: Man Of Will
programme.desc: In 1980s, a young scholar transforms into an independence fighter after being wrongly jailed.

programme.title: The Swordsman
programme.desc: Joseon’s greatest swordsman went hiding after the fall of King Gwanghae. When his daughter is taken hostage by a Qing envoy, he has no choice but to raise his sword again to rescue her.

programme.title: Marrying The Mafia 2: Enemy In Law
programme.desc: When In-Jae, the eldest son of a mafia family meets the beautiful Jin-Kyung, his mother is more than pleased but when they find out she is a prosecutor, it brings chaos to their family.

programme.title: The Fortress
programme.desc: King Injo and his court take refuge in a mountain fortress during the Qing Invasion of Korea. Caught between two ideological parties, he must make a choice that will determine the fate of the nation.

programme.title: Vanishing Time: A Boy Who Returned
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy goes missing after venturing into a cave in a forest with his friends and later mysteriously reappears a few days later as man in his 30s.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: Punch
programme.desc: A dysfunctional mentor-mentee relationship is forged between a rebellious high school student from a poor household and his meddlesome homeroom teacher who moves in next door.

programme.title: Battle Of Jangsari
programme.desc: A task force commander leads 772 student soldiers to flank the North Korean army and eliminate their supply line at Jangsari beach, in order to turn the tide of war in favor of South Korea.

programme.title: Howling
programme.desc: A detective and his rookie partner probe a murder in which the victim appears to have unusual bite marks.

programme.title: Burning
programme.desc: Jong-Su bumps into a girl who asks him to look after her cat while she goes on a trip to Africa. After returning, she introduces Ben, a mysterious guy she met there, who confesses his secret hobby.

programme.title: The Berlin File
programme.desc: A North Korean agent in Berlin is betrayed and cut loose when a weapons deal is exposed. He tries to escape being purged, while being pursued by a North and South Korean operative.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: Elite attorney Kang Seong-Hee goes up against a top prosecutor over a case involving a man accused of killing his wife.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: The Divine Move

programme.title: April Snow
programme.desc: A heart-piercing love story between two people, In-su and Seo-young, encountered under unexpected incident that began to shake their serene lives.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Cafe Midnight
programme.desc: Yoon went searching for her groom Taeyoung who didn't show up on the wedding day. She arrives at a strange place called 'Cafe Midnight' by chance and found a younger Taeyoung from the past.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep1011
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep1034

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep808809
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep658
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45584559
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep963964
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1789
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2002
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Jiang Play(M) Ep2
programme.desc: We are " Jiangplay " challenge, we are " Jiangplay " experience, understanding life and fun! So, get out of your comfort zone, break through your echo chamber!

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her father’s death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late father’s hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her father’s restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Special agent Nick (Daniel Wu), an undercover in the heart of Asia's lucrative heroin trade, is a Protégé to drug lord Quin (Andy Lau). In 8 years he eventually gains his trust and next in line to take over from his ill mentor. While Quin's health is going downhill, he plans to retire and unveils all his business secrets to Nick. When Nick infiltrates the syndicate to get enough evidence to arrest Quin, the unwritten law of brotherhood blurs with his professional duties. Nick finds himself corrupted by the easy money and his new found power. Unable to separate himself from his undercover identity, he is confused in moral dilemmas between justice, loyalty and true feeling from his soul in this illicit business.

programme.title: Cold War 2
programme.desc: Sean Lau is now the Police Commissioner after the successful rescue operation Cold War. However, the culprits from the past not only dodged justice but even escalated their actions and kidnapped Lau’s wife. He breaks every protocol to get her back, which puts him under investigation.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: The Eye

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80’s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition – to live the American dream.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Heng is a high school student whose mother abandoned the family eight years ago. You Mei is a teacher whose husband is having an affair. When You Mei becomes a temporary teacher at Heng's school, the two lonely souls develop a forbidden love.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 2
programme.desc: Qin Feng was tricked by Tang Ran to participate in the "World Detective Contest" in New York's Chinatown. Their task is to find the murderer of the grandson of Godfather, Uncle Qi. When famous detectives from all over the world investigate the case, two other cases occurred with a very similar modus operandi…

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: The Tag-Along: Devil Fish
programme.desc: When a man caught a fish from the lake and grilled it to eat, he heard a weird voice and saw a strange human face on the fish. Weird incidents occurred one after another, before a temple priest exorcises the malicious spirits brought on by the caught fish.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: As The Light Goes Out
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve in Hong Kong, a Team of firefighters battle an out-of-control warehouse fire that threatens to plunge the entire city into darkness. The team must put their differences aside and come together for an ultimate battle to stop the fire spreading to a nearby power plant.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killer’s mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened…

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father’s death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the “Toad Stance” and accidentally unveils his true identity…

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays Kwei Wu, who stumbles onto a kidnapping with his wife Kan Lien-chu (Chin Ping) at the Red Lotus Temple. Kan sends Kwei to go for reinforcements while she stays to fight the kidnappers, but she is captured and imprisoned in an iron cage. As Kwei returns with reinforcements, he must also race to the temple to save his wife.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read Ching Dynasty novel, this touching love story has proven a challenge to many filmmakers, and it is acclaimed as the most successful one. A sumptuous feature that took three years of planning and production, it was a hugely popular and critiqued hit which stands out as a classic combination of both 18th century literature and 1960s moviemaking.

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: The "godfather of the kung-fu film," Chang Cheh, started a winning streak by making the internationally renowned THE FIVE VENOMS. He followed that hit with many more high-flying "bloody good" entertainments featuring the same cast in new roles. But of all the "Venom" movies, this one stands out as perhaps the most chilling. Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Return of the Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studio’s highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kung’s brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: What Price Honesty
programme.desc: In this period martial arts thriller, three police graduates are assigned to a town rife with crimes and corruption. They vow to uphold justice but are hampered by their corrupt superior, resulting in them putting their lives and the lives of their beloved in danger.

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A noble martial arts student, whose master and peers are murdered by a bloodthirsty karate expert, embarks on a tough training regime so as to avenge them.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Liu’s disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan head’s son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin’s daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent’s consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her…

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King’s sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, seek to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: The Bells Of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.desc: Tamil mystery thriller film, Starring, Vishal, Trisha Krishnan, Sunaina, Jayaprakash & Others

programme.desc: Sethupathy features VIJAY SETHUPATHY & RAMYA NAMBEESAN. It is directed by S.A.Arunkumar & composed by Nivas K Prasanna. It received positive reviews from critics and was a commercial success

programme.title: Vanamagan

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.desc: Nearly Departed - While trying to find the serial killer Gibbs was after, the NCIS team discovers another person has been tracking the case as well

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep3
programme.desc: Road To Nowhere - Gibbs and Parker go on a road trip to find one of the serial killer’s victims. Also, Agent Knight goes undercover at a large manufacturing company with ties to the murders

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep4
programme.desc: Great Wide Open - Gibbs and McGee head to Alaska while the team works at home to uncover the conspiracy behind the serial killer

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep5
programme.desc: Face The Strange - The NCIS team investigates the death of a Navy commander whose body suddenly explodes before Jimmy can examine it

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep6
programme.desc: False Start - NCIS investigates the death of a beloved Navy commander who trained some of the top athletes in the country

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep15
programme.desc: Hard Ball - Jack negotiates Josh's contract while Kenneth the Page earns a spot in Tracy's entourage.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep16
programme.desc: The Source Awards - Jack forces Tracy to attend The Source Awards, while Kenneth the Page catches the eye of a hip-hop star's girlfriend -- with special guest stars LL Cool J, Wayne Brady and Ghostface Killah.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep17
programme.desc: The Fighting Irish - Jack welcomes his brother Eddie (Special Guest Star Nathan Lane) into the 'TGS' family.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep18
programme.desc: Fireworks - Jack (Alec Baldwin) turns to Kenneth (Jack McBrayer) for help when an aggressive West Coast NBC exec (Special Guest Star Will Arnett) declares he's after Donaghy's job.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep19
programme.desc: Corporate Crush - Liz finds love while Jack fights to keep his job.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S10 Ep92

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S10 Ep67
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S24 Ep12

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: In 1942, after falling in love with a French agent during a dangerous North African mission, an Allied counter-intelligence agent is quietly notified that the woman he has married and had a baby with is likely a Nazi spy.

programme.title: The Good Fight S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Day 408 - An unfortunate event brings the firm together, along with the prospect of a new name partner, Liz Reddick-Lawrence. Meanwhile, Diane struggles to grapple with the insanity of the world and Maia is confronted with another hurdle in her parents’ scandal.

programme.title: The Good Fight S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Day 415 - Tensions remain high when the firm learns another Chicago lawyer has been murdered by a client. Liz has her first day at Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart and positions herself as a potential ally for Diane. Maia’s trial takes an unwelcome turn when a surprise witness is called to testify against her. Lucca and Colin go head-to-head in court.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S10 Ep93
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Hamburger Hill
programme.desc: A brutal and realistic war film focuses on the lives of a squad of 14 U.S. Army soldiers in the battle for Hill 937 in the A Shau Valley of Vietnam.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: When retired CIA agent finds himself the target of a deadly assassin he reaches out to his old work friends in a bid to learn the truth while staying out of the mysterious enemy's clutches.

programme.title: Fatal Crossing
programme.desc: High flying tech entrepreneur Carson wakes up in a bloody car with no memory of what happened the night before. His world in chaos, things only get worse when he falls for June, who believes Carson killed her boyfriend.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A primatologist wants to return a gorilla to the wild, and a geologist wants to find diamonds. Their mutual expedition to the Congo uncovers the lost city of Zinj - and its deadly secret.

programme.desc: A soldier (Daniel Bernhardt) leads a band of mercenaries to rescue a scientist (Mädchen Amick) and prevent a terrorist (Joel West) from unleashing a devastating virus.

programme.title: Battle In Seattle
programme.desc: Seattle broke into a full-scale state of emergency as thousands of protestors gathered in resistance to the World Trade Organization. The lives of the city’s mayor, a SWAT cop on the streets and his pregnant wife, and four demonstrators intersect in the ensuing riots.

programme.title: Bad Country
programme.desc: Bad Country concerns a veteran Baton Rouge detective who infiltrates the most powerful criminal enterprise in the South and after taking down its top lieutenant and contract killer, convinces him to turn informant to help bring down the entire organization.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: Beta Test
programme.desc: Champion gamer Max Troy discovers events in a video game are being mirrored in the real world. Joining forces with the game's protagonist to unravel the conspiracy before the game's sinister plot overwhelms the city.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths befalls their small town, an offbeat group of friends.

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sydney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Ridge of Fire Part 1 - An inconspicuous hill on the Spanish Island of La Palma bursts open, releasing an avalanche of lava. In its path are the homes of seven thousand residents and the emergency services rush to evacuate. Within twenty-four hours, volcano expert Chris Horsley is on the scene.

programme.title: Serengeti S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Pressure - As the land dries, everyone struggles to find water. The hippos get trapped in the shrinking lake, and Nalla the elephant finds a clever solution to quench everyone's thirst.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep3
programme.desc: It's Not Just You - This episode handpicks a bunch of experiences that are common to human beings, no matter what age, lifestyle or cultural background they come from. It makes a great case to prove that - you are not the only one and there are others just like you.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Science of Sport - This episode features the million questions we tend to ask ourselves every time we watch an excellent game of sport, bringing the science behind sporting action!

programme.title: The Mating Game S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Oceans: Out Of The Blue - The Ocean is where life first experimented with the Mating Game, and over time this has led to some of the most ingenious mating strategies of all!

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Silk Road Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Georgia and Azerbaijan - Joanna continues her adventure following the ancient Silk Road from the Black Sea to the Caspian Sea, across the rapidly changing post-Soviet states of Georgia and Azerbaijan.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea - The Kokoda Trail - The Kokoda Trail is a single file footpath that runs in a straight line through Papua New Guinea. As hot days give way to intensely cold nights, it becomes clear why so many have died from the extreme natural elements.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Your Health and More - One could be mildly interested in the topic of health or a bracketed health conscious cookie - this episode has something for everyone. It has a bouquet of stories that are current and relevant, curated to pique interest.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Growing Up - A dozen external voices, old wives' tales and gentle advice come along as a person takes the journey from childhood into adulthood. This episode targets the confusion with various stories, helping in clearing the fog around many theories.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Volcano - Volcan del Fuego in Guatemala is one of the most 'explosive' volcanoes of them all. To reveal what's happening within the volcano, visit the 'new' Island of Surtsey, flamingos flocking in Kenya, and a boiling geyser in Iceland. Witness the daring attempt to lower a data gathering probe right into the crater of a volcano just before it erupts.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels through the remote and little-visited north east of South America, from Venezuela to French Guiana.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S10 Ep3
programme.desc: Frigid Fortitudes - As winter's presence descends upon Alaska, its residents endure battles of wit and nature, learning valuable lessons from both as they progress.

programme.desc: Pressure - As the land dries, everyone struggles to find water. The hippos get trapped in the shrinking lake, and Nalla the elephant finds a clever solution to quench everyone's thirst.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: To The Ends of the Earth - Starting on the treacherous Tea Horse Road stretching from southern China into Tibet, India and beyond. We discover the healing wonder of matcha tea in an ancient Japanese temple and hear about the extraordinary rescue of the forgotten Georgian tea gardens.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Russia - Steve Backshall and his team paddle up the remote Kronotsky River in Russia, in a protected area which is also full of wildlife such as Brown Bears.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: South Australia - Robson makes a gruelling 24 hour journey to the jaw-dropping and bountiful shores of South Australia, where he hunts for the biggest fish down under - the mighty Murray cod.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee’s Diary tells that story.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth’s oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Weatherproof Ep1
programme.desc: Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Agile Ep2
programme.desc: Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - Living on the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, it’s a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - The Acacia Loop Ep3
programme.desc: As the dry season begins, thousands of animals are making their way to the Acacia Loop. Each must establish their place in the pecking order and avoid the dangerous residents who are all too willing to make a meal of the unwary.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Arc of Baringo Ep2
programme.desc: Ol Pejeta must help move eight giraffes to a newly opened wildlife area on an island several hundred kilometers away. How do you move the tallest animals on the planet?

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary Ep3
programme.desc: On the West Coast of the United States, the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary is the largest marine sanctuary in the country - home to 525 species of fish, and a massive, underwater Kelp forest.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Predators Uncovered Ep3
programme.desc: In the heart of the Zambian bush is a unique and special place. A beautiful Valley, bursting with life. It is home to a rich and diverse array of wildlife and is one of the last remaining strongholds for some of Africa's most endangered large carnivores.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Flight of the Pachyderms Ep3
programme.desc: The vets encounter a difficult predicament when a large elephant wanders off and ends up in a local village in an agitated state. If they can’t find a helicopter to help with herding immediately, they will have to have the elephant shot.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - The Acacia Loop Ep3
programme.desc: As the dry season begins, thousands of animals are making their way to the Acacia Loop. Each must establish their place in the pecking order and avoid the dangerous residents who are all too willing to make a meal of the unwary.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Stripes of Serima Ep4
programme.desc: The vets have Zebras on their minds. The endangered and beautiful Grevy’s zebras have to be isolated to bel breed. On the other side of the reserve, the more common zebras are destroying the cattle’s grazing land and have to be moved.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - The Enemies Within Ep5
programme.desc: Vet Batian is leaving Ol Pejeta after six years and he's organizing his team for one last action: a massive translocation of three species—about 500 animals. But when things go wrong, the staff is forced to come up with plan B.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - The Mesoamerican Reef Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Return of Hunters Ep4
programme.desc: Liuwa Plains National Park is a vast uncharted sea of golden grassland in the heart of Southern Africa. Remote and wild, it was once home to huge grazing herds of wildebeest and zebras, with predators such as lions and cheetahs lurking in the long grass. When civil war came to neighboring Angola, the abundant wildlife of Liuwa was quickly decimated by poachers, and for many years the park lay in a dormant, almost lifeless state. Peace has now returned and this film follows an extraordinary band of conservationists who are working to restore Liuwa to its former glory.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - The Next Generation Ep3
programme.desc: Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the ocean’s most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Social Ep3
programme.desc: Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies’ unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scrappy Ep4
programme.desc: Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias’ stink bombs; honey badgers’ savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls’ razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - Living on the Edge Ep2

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Foxes Ep1
programme.desc: Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Rivers Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Wild East swims in the Rivers of Nova Scotia. Two species of fish, the Shad and the Gaspereau swim upstream to their ancestral spawning grounds, while a colony of Double-Crested Cormorants thrive on the mouth of the Pictou River.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Bahamas Exuma Cays Ep5
programme.desc: The Exuma Cays are a remote wonder: hundreds of tiny islands extending south from the Bahamian Capital of Nassau. In the 1950’s, developers dreamed of developing this pristine, and largely unexplored region. But before construction could begin, the Bahamian government supported an expedition to chart the cays. They liked what they saw, and in 1959 established the Bahamas National Trust, creating the Bahamas’ first Ocean Park.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Heidelberg Ep1
programme.desc: Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Pointy Bits Ep5
programme.desc: Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scroungers/Scavengers Ep6
programme.desc: Go scavenging with nature’s cleanup crew. See Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; learn how dung beetles roll over the competition; view wild boars’ fierce mating strategies; and watch hyenas’ bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - A Life Among Trees Ep3

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Hluhluwe-Imfolozi Ep5
programme.desc: In the heart of Zululand, South Africa, lies the oldest game reserve on the African continent – Hluhluwe-iMfolozi. Here, Southern white rhinos have found protection from people in times of turmoil. Hunted almost to extinction at the end of the 19th century, the park’s establishment gave rhinos a lifeline – breeding them back from extinction.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Drought Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Florida, a unique and complex ecosystem known as the Everglades has entered its winter season. Predator and prey are forced to live in close proximity due to a limited supply of water.

programme.desc: Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2) Ep11
programme.desc: Rick joins a team diving for razor clams, makes a dish of grilled shangurro clams, visits Newlyn's ordnance datum and is shown beautiful copperwork at the Penlee Museum.

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down (S4) Ep9
programme.desc: It's the semi-final and the potters have to make a hand built sink and pedestal and decorate a chamber pot with a message for a loved one.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee (S7) Ep10
programme.desc: The Final - It's the final, and the theme is celebration. The three remaining sewers work on a bridesmaid's dress, a festival-themed transformation and a glamorous off-the-shoulder gown.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S19) Ep6
programme.desc: South Lakeland - Turning a crumbling, structurally unsound ruin into a home, especially by yourselves and on an extremely tight budget, sounds to most like a nightmare. Yet adventurous, super optimistic young Cumbrian couple Rob and Ruth want to do it.

programme.title: Hungry For It (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The doors to the HFI hub are open! Ten rookie cooks set off on the ultimate crash course on how to make it in the food business.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S6) Ep15
programme.desc: It's the final, and the four remaining bakers create a themed afternoon tea, with entremets and pastries, and a showstopping tiered layer cake. Who will be crowned the winner?

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down (S4) Ep9
programme.desc: It's the semi-final and the potters have to make a hand built sink and pedestal and decorate a chamber pot with a message for a loved one.

programme.title: Hungry For It (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The doors to the HFI hub are open! Ten rookie cooks set off on the ultimate crash course on how to make it in the food business.

programme.title: My Unique B&B (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: George and Al's Van - Master craftsman Simon Parfett helps a married couple transform their worn out camper van into a unique B&B in an old quarry.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Chef Donal Skehan and his dog Max visit West Cork to meet regional food producers and visit local landmarks.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Jamie kicks off his new one-pan series with a simplified and delicious frying-pan pasta, a clever twist on a fish pie that's full of flavour with none of the fuss, and a sublime roast lamb feast with a fantastic hack to speed up cooking.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Jamie cooks three one-pan recipes that provide a perfect solution for busy life: a super-fast, flavour-packed smoky noodle soup; the cleverest homemade bread in a pan; and a chicken & mushroom pie with a time-saving tip for perfect pastry.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S5) Ep1
programme.desc: The junior bakers enter the Bake Off tent for their exciting baking challenges on Cake Day.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home (S5) Ep2
programme.desc: Yorkshire & Buckinghamshire - George takes on a project that is part period house, part dog's dinner. And the thought of a corner cocktail bar proves a real tonic for a tricky refurb project.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Chef Donal Skehan and his dog Max visit West Cork to meet regional food producers and visit local landmarks.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: The Park Restaurant & Bar - Kirin and Angelika Stone, owners of this gastropub in Oak Park, California, are weeks away from going out of business. programme.desc: We bring you the very hottest music videos in the world right now!

programme.title: Global Beats!
programme.desc: Tune in for a selection of the biggest Hip-Hop, R&B and Reggaeton beats that are taking over the world!

programme.title: The Rock Zone!
programme.desc: You are now entering the rock zone! Expect nothing but the biggest, loudest, hottest rock tunes to ever exist!

programme.title: My Life On MTV: Justin...
programme.desc: Timberlake & Jennifer Lopez. These triple threats had their come up in the 90s on MTV...and now two plus decades later, we are still obsessed. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: My Life On MTV: Jonas Brothers...
programme.desc: & Usher. There are teen idols...and then there are Jobros and Usher. Both have been in the music biz for decades, and we have the footage to prove it! (S1, ep6)

programme.title: My Life On MTV: Britney & *NSYNC
programme.desc: No one saw the late 90s pop explosion coming but once these two future legends stepped on the TRL stage they quickly became family, and gave us some of the best pop moments in MTV history. (S1, ep9)

programme.title: My Life On MTV: 1D & Backstreet...
programme.desc: Boys. Boy Band Alert! Two different eras of pop music. Two different eras of MTV. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep15
programme.desc: The Compst Elf / Meet Ya At The Stump - The streets get trashy when Archibald misinforms folks about compost. Archibald and his pals rally when their favorite hangout is threatened.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep42
programme.desc: Wrestlebabia: The Musica / Flowers For Munk - When Sandy can't join animal wrestling she poses as “Mandy Monkhuahua”; In order to help Munk, Grug sticks super worms up his nose that make him smarter

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep41
programme.desc: Lucky And The Flight Of The Fancy - Lucky, Julian and Aunt Cora get swept away in Julian’s new hot air balloon and must fend for themselves in the wilderness

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep41
programme.desc: Miracle On Harvey Street / I Know What You Did Last Summer - Lotta brings Hanukkah to Harvey Street with a live holiday special. Stu and Audrey get their hands on a jet pack to blast into space.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep41
programme.desc: How To Train Your Titmouse/The Good The Bad And The Bugly - Turbo takes Beakless under his wing during a battle of snails vs. birds; Chet is Sheriff of a western Turbotown and fights a gang of outlaw crickets.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep15
programme.desc: The Compst Elf / Meet Ya At The Stump - The streets get trashy when Archibald misinforms folks about compost. Archibald and his pals rally when their favorite hangout is threatened.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep41
programme.desc: Sticky Situation / The Freshmans - Tip starts dating Stick, but ruins the relationship when she tries to change him/Tip tries to impress the older kids at her first ninth grade party but, Oh's Boovy behavior embarrasses her

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep41
programme.desc: The Neverending Clover - After Clover is knocked unconscious, the entire kingdom plays along when she wakes up believing she's living in a make-believe storybook world

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep1
programme.desc: Little Trouble In Big China - It's the Lunar New Year and Odlulu has accidentally brought a stone dragon to life! Wally and Wenda work with local siblings Li and Liu, members of a dragon dance team, to tame the dragon and keep the celebration from being ruined.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Nova’s toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep6
programme.desc: Bug Zapper/The Helper - When Mr. Ladybug finds the new bug zapper the Humans installed to be irresistible, the Mighty Ones try creating distractions to keep him from zapping himself. / When Rabbit realizes Rocksy is great at "conflict management," he tricks her into helping him strongarm other yard denizens in order to get what he wants.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep41
programme.desc: In Dreams - When Puss asks the second witch sister Malaranea for her gem, she casts a spell that makes him a prisoner in his dreams and only Dulcinea can save him

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep15
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Two - A video of Rocky and Bullwinkle playing a song goes viral and they’re rocketed to musical superstardom. They decide to use their newfound celebrity to launch a “save the birdbath” concert tour to restore the giant birdbath they destroyed.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep41
programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep41
programme.desc: Blood Duel - When Zarkon demands a tradeoff, the team has a difference of opinion on what to do; Meanwhile, Haggarobsesses over the past

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep17
programme.desc: The Case Of The Upset Captain - Pirate Captain says he doesn't want to be the captain anymore. Noddy investigates how they can help him and he soon finds the reason for the Captain's distress: someone took his beard! Noddy sets out in search of the missing beard.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep18
programme.desc: The Case Of Revs & Tractor - Revs and Tractor are doing Tom's deliveries together, but only Tractor comes back. Why isn't Revs with Tractor? Tractor is too upset to explain what happened, so Noddy investigates to find his friend.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep19
programme.desc: The Case Of The Toyland Circus - It's the Toyland Circus and all the toys are rehearsing an act - all except Smartysaurus, who rushes away, apparently too shy to take part. Noddy has to find a way to help Smartysaurus find an act for the circus.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep20
programme.desc: The Case Of The Deltoid'S Missing Strength - Action-hero Deltoid suddenly loses all his strength and finds himself totally helpless. Noddy quickly starts an investigation: How can he help Deltoid get his strength back?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep17
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jungle Fixers - Raa Raas friends help him to fix lots of broken things around the Jingly Jangly Jungle.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep18
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jingly Jungle Show - Raa Raa and his friends put on a Jungle show but with everyone performing on stage who will watch it

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep19
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jungle Gym - An over enthusiastic Raa Raa breaks Pias new Jungle Gym but he manages to fix it so everyone can have a turn.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep20
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Drip Drop Waterfall - The waterfall has lost its tinkly tonk sound so Raa Raa and his friends set out to find it.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep17
programme.desc: Simply The Best - Molecom is very grateful to Plugger for rescuing him after yet another of Flash's pranks. But Plugger is soon frustrated by Molecom's attempts to help… Meanwhile, Roary is trying hard to beat his best lap time.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep18
programme.desc: Cici Wins The Day - Cici is fed up with never winning and decides not to take part in the race that day. Can Roary persuade her to change her mind?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep19
programme.desc: Heavy Loader - Roary takes Loada on a jaunt to the beach… only to discover that sand and lorries don't mix too well!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep20
programme.desc: Testing Time For Maxi - PC Pete and Nick are up at Silver hatch giving the cars their road tests. Is Maxi really going to be as good as he says he is or will he be unpleasantly surprised?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep9
programme.desc: Bands On The Run / Vote For Casper - Bands on the Run Casper and Jimmy form a rock band to compete in the Deedstown Battle of the Bands. Vote for Casper Mantha is angling to win the office of Class Rep, but Kibosh fancies having a fellow ghost in power.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep10
programme.desc: Permission Impossible/What Possessed You - Permission Impossible When Ra's parents refuse to let him go on the school camping trip, he sneaks away and gets lost in the Scary Woods with Casper and Mantha. What Possessed You? When a lesson in taking possession of a human body goes awry, Casper's human ends up taking possession of him!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep42
programme.desc: Shell On Wheels/Keep On Truckin - Skidmark competes with rich snail Shellsworth to build a railroad; Turbo and Chet roadtrip with their trucker dad and protect their cargo from bandits.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep16
programme.desc: A Taste Of Crackridge / The Bird And The Bee - Archibald's Souper Stew is a surprise hit with the residents of Crackridge. Archibald and his pal Bea reminisce about how they first met.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep43
programme.desc: Ocb - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months — everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep42
programme.desc: Midnight Scrum - When Viggo puts a bounty on Hiccup's head, every Dragon Hunter in the world is after capturing Hiccup, so Toothless and the Riders must rescue him.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep42
programme.desc: Fluteus Maximus - When Puss approaches the third witch sister Maliflua, he discovers she is actually the Piper and that a fourth witch is much closer than ever imagined

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep42
programme.desc: Who Arted? - King Julien is crazy with jealousy and throws out the kingdom's art after he is upstaged by Mort who is now the town's hottest new artist

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep42
programme.desc: Scrapbookmobile / Troll Rangers - When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep42
programme.desc: Picktools - While traveling through the tundra to find a way home, the Trux get trapped on thin ice and think they’re done for when they encounter PICKTOOLS

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep5
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Pancake Party - Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Olivia Ep33
programme.desc: Olivia Explores The Attic - Olivia searches high and low for Grandma's missing time capsule, and eventually finds it tucked away, forgotten, in the attic. Olivia is puzzled and thrilled by the objects that she finds from Grandmother's childhood, and is inspired to create her own time capsule.

programme.title: Olivia Ep34
programme.desc: Olivia'S Good Luck - Olivia is determined to sell more Young Pioneers cookies than anybody else in her troupe – especially Francine. It turns out to be harder than she thought it would be, but with a little perseverance and ingenuity, Olivia manages to do her personal best.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep31
programme.desc: New Juice - Conrod is visiting Silver Hatch to try out some new bio fuel. But Big Chris fears something is wrong with it after he comes out in spots after sampling a smoothie made from the same produce. What or who could be at fault?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep32
programme.desc: Fb For Football - The cars are having a football tournament down at the beach. FB learns that if he relaxes, his natural footballing skills will shine through.

programme.desc: Lucky And The Jam Jam - The PALs try to figure out why Marciela is acting so weird, while Miradero is gripped by April Fool’s Day fever

programme.desc: The Case Of The Knocked Down Fences - While Hoof is about to do his obstacle course, he finds all the fences knocked down. He blames Bling, who was jealous of the lucky wings he wears on his hoofs, but Bling assures she's got nothing to do with it ! Noddy investigates to settle their argument.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep22
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unfinished Building - Strange accidents keep happening on the building site. Clockwork Mouse is convinced that someone is trying to stop them finishing the building. Noddy investigates and finds out things aren't quite as they seem...

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep23
programme.desc: The Case Of The Damaged Magic Box - Pat-Pat is doing a magic show but she discovers her magic box is broken. Noddy investigates: Who broke the magic box? He needs to find out soon so that Pat Pat's show can take place.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep24
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Pirates - Armed with a brand new sat-nav from Fuse, the Pirates head off on The Pirate Challenge, sailing all around Toyland. But when they fail to arrive at their first stop in Toy Green, Noddy investigates what's happened. He must set the Pirates back on course to complete the challenge by the end of the day.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep21
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Noisy Nap - Raa Raa and his friends are looking for a rumbly noise while Crocky tries to find a quiet spot for a nap.
